Interface IConversionEngine


  • public interface IConversionEngine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clearIdentityExchangeRateBuffer()
      clears the Identity Exchange Rate buffer
      ICalculationResult convertWithFactorsAndExponent(double value, double numerator, double denominator, int exponent, double offset)
      Converts value via scaling and translation rather than with a unit The formula is: double result = (((value * numerator) / denominator) + offset) * Math.exp(exponent * C_LOG10);
      java.util.Collection getAllPhysicalUnits()

      Returns IExchangeRate matching an exchange rate type, a source currency, a target currency and a conversion date; an external exchange rate can be specified for conversion
      IExchangeRate getExchangeRateForExactDate(java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName, java.lang.String fromCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, SAPDate date)
      includes evaluation of customizing
      IExchangeRate getExchangeRateForExactDatePlain(java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName, java.lang.String fromCurrency, java.lang.String toCurrency, SAPDate date)
      does not includes evaluation of customizing - plain access to DB

      • getCurrencyValue

        ICurrencyValue getCurrencyValue(java.lang.String value,
                                java.lang.String unitName)
                         throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                                ConversionParseException
        Creates an ICurrencyValue from a value string and the name of a unit.
        Parameters:
        value - amount (String) in parsable form (Format #.##0.)
        unitName - name of currency unit, eg. USD
        Returns:
        ICurrencyValue
        Throws:
        ConversionMissingDataException - if the unit does not exist in database
        ConversionParseException - if the parsing of value fails.
        ConversionMissingDataException
        ConversionParseException

        Returns:
        ICurrencyValue
        Throws:
        ConversionMissingDataException - if isoCode does not exist in the database

      • getQuantityUnit

        IQuantityUnit getQuantityUnit(java.lang.String internalUnitName,
                              IConversionProduct product)
                       throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                              ConversionInconsistentDataException
        Creates an IQuantityUnit from an internal unit Name and a product
        Parameters:
        internalUnitName - SAP internal (language-neutral) unit name e, eg. "ST"
        product - product used to check if unit is valid
        Returns:
        IQuantityUnit
        Throws:
        throws - ConversionMissingDataException, if unit is not found in the database; throws ConversionInconsistentDataException if unit name is not the name of the base unit of measure or not an alternative unit of measure of the product.
        ConversionMissingDataException
        ConversionInconsistentDataException

      • getExchangeRate

        IExchangeRate getExchangeRate(java.lang.String exchangeRateTypeName,
                              java.lang.String fromCurrency,
                              java.lang.String toCurrency,
                              SAPDate date,
                              java.math.BigDecimal externalRate)
                       throws ConversionMissingDataException,
                              CurrencyConversionException
        Returns IExchangeRate matching an exchange rate type, a source currency, a target currency and a conversion date; an external exchange rate can be specified for conversion
        Parameters:
        exchangeRateTypeName - exchange rate type name
        fromCurrency - source currency
        toCurrency - target currency
        date - conversion date
        externalRate - external rate which should be used for conversion
        Returns:
        IExchangeRate
        Throws:
        throws - ConversionMissingDataException if source currency, target currency, exchange rate type, exchange rate or conversion factor do not exists in the database; throws CurrencyConversionException if an be found
        ConversionMissingDataException
        CurrencyConversionException

      • convertWithFactorsAndExponent

        ICalculationResult convertWithFactorsAndExponent(double value,
                                                 double numerator,
                                                 double denominator,
                                                 int exponent,
                                                 double offset)
                                          throws ConversionArithmeticException
        Converts value via scaling and translation rather than with a unit The formula is: double result = (((value * numerator) / denominator) + offset) * Math.exp(exponent * C_LOG10);
        Parameters:
        valueIn - value to convert
        numerator - numerator
        denominator - denominator
        exponent - exponent
        offset - offset
        Returns:
        ICalculationResult, the conversion result
        Throws:
        throws - ConversionArithmeticException if denominator is 0
        ConversionArithmeticException

      • getConversionProduct

        IConversionProduct getConversionProduct(java.lang.String productID,

                                        java.lang.String internalBaseUnitName)
                                 throws ConversionMissingDataException
        Creates a conversion product
        Parameters:
        productID -
        externalProductId -
        logicalSystem -
        productType -
        objectFamily -
        description -
        internalBaseUnitName -
        Returns:
        IConversionProduct
        Throws:
        throws - ConversionMissingDataException if internal base is not found in the databse unit
        ConversionMissingDataException
